quest.name: Rushing up That Hill
journal:
 Quest Sync
Kusuma seems hesitant to address you.
objectives: Use the giantsgall knife to obtain bark shavings from the hillside tree.
Deliver the bark shavings and the giantsgall knife to Kusuma.

dialogue.name: KUSUMA
dialogue.text: Excuse me, explorer...mercenary...adventuring person! Normally, I wouldn't dream of bothering you, but this hardly seems the time to overburden the valiant soldiers of the Radiant Host.

dialogue.name: KUSUMA
dialogue.text: I just need a simple ingredient to further my current research. The complicated part is harvesting said ingredient without being murdered by the local wildlife.

dialogue.name: KUSUMA
dialogue.text: Would you be so kind as to venture into the hills and fetch me some bark shavings from the trees which grow there? Here, I'll lend you my special bark-stripping knife!

dialogue.name: KUSUMA
dialogue.text: Please take care not to lose the knife─it's made from giantsgall, and was very expensive!

dialogue.name: KUSUMA
dialogue.text: Ah, you're back! Have you brought the bark...and my knife?

dialogue.name: KUSUMA
dialogue.text: Yes, this smells absolutely wonderful! I can already imagine the fragrance when I craft the next batch of incense.

dialogue.name: KUSUMA
dialogue.text: I'm studying various methods for enhancing the effects of incense, you see─specifically the scents which promote calm and tranquility.

dialogue.name: KUSUMA
dialogue.text: And with everything that's been happening, well, we could all do with a dose of calm and tranquility, couldn't we?

dialogue.name: KUSUMA
dialogue.text: Life can be trying at the best of times, and I'm hoping my research will help people endure the worst of them. Thank you kindly for your assistance!
